title: How to find these hidden signature in a TTF?
content:
![he hide a signature in MSoffice cab font!](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824210712im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4101/32939.gif)   
   
a type designer , hide his signature in some charactor in 2 Chinese font of MS office font cab.   
i knows some location,but how can i dig out all the secret?
author: fontdj

comments.content:
the fonts name are simli and simyou   
the sample glyph's unicode is 80E1
